Document: ## Dairy -Cheese Wheel = Mix 40u Milk + 5u UniEnzyme (Catalyst) -Chevre Log = Mix 10u Goat Milk + 5u UniEnzyme (Catalyst) -Stick of Butter = Mix 30u Milk + 5u Table Salt (Catalyst) -Curd Cheese = Mix 15u Milk + 5u Vinegar + 5u Cream -Cheese Curds = Microwave 1 Curd Cheese for 5 Seconds -Mozzarella = Mix 15u Milk + 10 Cream + 5u UniEnzyme -Herby Cheese = Microwave 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris for 5 seconds -Stick of Cannabis Butter = Microwave 1 stick of butter + 6 cannabis leaves for 15 seconds
